snippet: The defending N.H.L. champion Los Angeles Kings joined most teams in the league in practicing Sunday for the first time, working out at Toyota Sports Center in El Segundo, Calif.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Los Angeles Kings, defending Stanley Cup champion, join most teams in practicing for first time, working out at Toyota Sports Center in El Segundo, Calif; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: The defending N.H.L. champion Los Angeles Kings joined most teams in the league in practicing Sunday for the first time, working out at Toyota Sports Center in El Segundo, Calif.

headline.main: Kings Open Their Camp as Reigning Champions
headline.print_headline: Kings Open Their Camp As Reigning Champions
